description: I. VAT - change of the standard rate to 20 per cent: anti-forestalling legislation. Guidance note. 14 p. II. VAT - change of the standard rate to 20 per cent: a detailed guide for VAT-registered businesses. Incl. annexes. 50 p. III. Finance Bill 2010. Resolution 00. Clause 3. Schedule 2. Explanatory note: VAT-increase in standard rate and anti-avoidance provision. 6 p. IV. Rate of vaule added tax. 1 p. V. Finance Bill 2010. Resolution 00. Clause 3. Schedule 2. Supplementary charge to VAT. Part 1. 9 p. VI. VAT: Increase in the standard rate and anti-avoidance. Draft legislation and explanatory note. 20 p.
